statements: DELETE FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics WHERE pitcher_id = 100 AND strikeouts > 150
DELETE FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics WHERE WHIP < 1.2 OR ERA > 4.0
DELETE FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_id = 100 AND pitcher_id = 1;
DELETE FROM PitcherGameStats WHERE pitcher_id = 101 AND game_id = 201;
DELETE FROM PitcherGameStats WHERE game_id = 301 AND strikeouts <= 5;
DELETE FROM PitcherGameStats WHERE game_id = 1000 AND pitcher_id = 10;
DELETE FROM PlayerStats WHERE team_id = 3 AND era < 3.50;
DELETE FROM pitchers_stats WHERE runs > 5 AND strikeouts < 10;
DELETE FROM teams_stats WHERE hits > 10 AND errors > 2;
